text: If you could live in any fictional world, which one would you choose?
If you could have one 'do-over' in your life, what would it be?
If you found a suitcase with a million dollars, what's the first thing you'd do?
If you could time travel, would you go to the past or the future? Why?
If you could master any skill instantly, what would it be?
If you could switch lives with someone for a day, who would it be?
If you could solve one world problem, what would it be?
If you had to eat one food for the rest of your life, what would it be?
If you could be an animal for a day, which one would you choose?
If you could have any job in the world, regardless of pay or qualifications, what would it be?
If you could invent something, what problem would it solve?
If you could bring one extinct species back to life, which would it be?
If you could only listen to three musical artists for the rest of your life, who would they be?
If you could have a conversation with any historical figure, who would you choose?
If you could change one thing about the world, what would it be?
If you were stranded on a desert island, what three items would you want with you?
If you could have a mythical creature as a pet, what would it be?
If you could write a book, what genre would it be and what would it be about?
If you could witness any event in history, past, present, or future, what would it be?
If you could only keep five possessions, what would they be?
